thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 29 of 805
thread.title: Berit Koehler

author: Berit Koehler
title: Berit Koehler
text:
It was very difficult to find the counter since nobody had told me that Thrifty is a part of Hertz. The sign was well hidden.
The service at the counter was really friendly and uncomplicated.
The only reason why they do not get 5 stars is because of the very unpolite guy when we delivered the car back. He didn't say hello or anything else. Only a very short answer when asking whether we were done. Quite rude.
But the car was great and it was incredibly cheap. Thanks!
